b36","dweb:/ipfs/QmRdxuU4W3yEBNeQGXrofJCTNStksEmLKrMgvG6Z757Qk4"]},"contracts/src/interfaces/IX402PaymentGate.sol":{"keccak256":"0x72e6750391a7057560e5df8cac873cfc71501acbc2cccd427af182567c58418c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fc8eb91fa7514c3eb22c06b4a3beee76e5e9a233a3085450c8f5b594316a1747","dweb:/ipfs/QmXeGZmcwN4vGhvFsobzDASmmnPJM6vR7Yf1NQW5CzV3sk"]}},"version":1}

params._usdc: The USDC token contract address on Base

returns._0: The PaymentInfo struct with payer, amount, resource, timestamp, and settlement status
The price in USDC (with USDC decimals)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processPayment(address,uint256,bytes32).details: Transfers USDC from the payer to this contract. Validates payment amount      against the resource price. Generates a unique payment ID for the record.

params.resourceId: The identifier of the resource being accessed

returns.paymentId: The unique identifier for this payment record

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

routeRevenue().details: Transfers all accumulated USDC revenue to the RevenuePool. Can be called      by anyone to trigger the routing (permissionless for liveness).

params.authorized: Whether the address should be authorized
params.processor: The address to authorize or revoke

setResourcePrice(bytes32,uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Setting price to 0 effectively disables the resource.

params.price: The price in USDC (with USDC decimals)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

accumulatedRevenue().notice: Total accumulated USDC revenue awaiting routing

authorizedProcessors(address).notice: Set of addresses authorized to process payments

getPayment(bytes32).notice: Get payment details by payment ID

getResourcePrice(bytes32).notice: Get the price of a resource in USDC

processPayment(address,uint256,bytes32).notice: Process a USDC payment for resource access

revenuePool().notice: The RevenuePool contract that receives routed revenue

routeRevenue().notice: Route accumulated USDC revenue to the RevenuePool contract

setAuthorizedProcessor(address,bool).notice: Authorize or revoke a payment processor address (owner only)

setResourcePrice(bytes32,uint256).notice: Set the price for a resource in USDC

setRevenuePool(address).notice: Update the revenue pool address (owner only)

usdc().notice: The USDC token contract on Base
